readable.title: 3498997518_c2b16f0a0e
readable.content: A football player in blue grabs a football player in white for a tackle . A football player is being tackled by the rival team . A football player is tackling the player with the football as the crowd watches . Football players on a feild the one on the left in a blue uniform the one on the right in a white one with the fans in the back . Two football player from the opposite team are holding back the one with the ball .
